newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso down to 996.55 in quiet session.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso down to 996.55 in quiet session.

text.p: Colombia's peso drifted down 0.63 to 996.55 per dollar in steady trading Thursday, interbank dealers said.
"The markets were very quiet and I think that was the reason that nobody was trading large volumes," one trader said.
Fluctuations throughout the session were slight. The peso hit an intra-day high of 996.26 and a low of 996.65 after opening at 996.35.
Dealers reported 227 trades worth a of $147.5 million. There were few individual trades worth more than $60,000, reflecting the small volumes being traded.
Dealers predicted the peso would continue close to the ceiling of its floating rate exchange band, which was set Thursday at 996.26.
